name: WikiSS13
author: PhasecoreX (PhasecoreX#0635)
pali (pali#0439)
harryob
short: Look up articles on a MediaWiki instance.
description: Allows for looking up terms on a MediaWiki instance, and having the results displayed in chat. Fork of https://github.com/goonstation/gooncogs/tree/main/wikiss13 to allow a configured wiki, which is a fork of https://github.com/PhasecoreX/PCXCogs/tree/master/wikipedia that has been mutilated to work with a different wiki.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
